questions.question: They have been living here ...................................... six years.
questions.description: For indicates duration. It is used with a period of time.

questions.question: I have been working in this office .................................... July.
questions.description: Since indicates the starting point of something.

questions.question: I haven't seen him ..................................... Monday.
questions.description: Since indicates the starting point of something.

questions.question: It has been a long time ...................................... I watched a movie.
questions.description: Since indicates the starting point of something.

questions.question: She has been learning English .................................. six months.
questions.description: For indicates duration. It is used with a period of time.

questions.question: I have known him ..................................... our school days.
questions.description: Since indicates the starting point of something.

questions.question: It hasn't stopped raining ......................................... yesterday.
questions.description: Since indicates the starting point of something.

questions.question: She has been unemployed ......................................... she left college.
questions.description: Since indicates the starting point of something.

questions.question: It has been a long time ....................................... we last met.
questions.description: Since indicates the starting point of something.

questions.question: She has been unhappy ......................................... her divorce.
questions.description: Since indicates the starting point of something.

questions.question: I have worked hard ........................................ years.
questions.description: For indicates duration. It is used with a period of time.
